item.title: CHIKV Model
item.description: Based on this: Yakob L, Clements AC. A mathematical model of chikungunya dynamics and control: the major epidemic on Réunion Island. PLoS One. 2013;8(3):e57448. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0057448 https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3590184/ suppressMessages(library(EpiModel)) chikv <-function(t, t0, parms) { with(as.list(c(t0, parms)), { num <- s.num + e.num + i.num + ia.num + r.num num.m <- x.num + y.num + z.num dS <- -1*beta1*(s.num)*(z.num / num.m) dE <- (beta1*(s.num)*(z.num / num.m)) - (lambda1*(e.num)) dI <- (theta*lambda1*(e.num)) - (gamma*(i.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a statistical analyst and experienced software developer in the fields of epidemiology, bioinformatics, and computational biology. My expertise areas Mathematical modeling: compartmental and agent-based Network models Advanced social epidemiology methods I can do most things in R and Python. I’m also practiced in SAS, Stata, C#, Java, and C++. Prior work experience CDC UNICEF WHO Emory University Macromoltek, Inc. I’m available as a consultant on data management, exploratory data analysis, and statistical analysis projects.
